casebody.data:
BRYSON, et al.
v.
ATTORNEY GENERAL, et al. No. 640P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2005. Lester Daniel Bryson, Pro Se, for Bryson and Bowen.

William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Pro Se, et al.

The following order has been entered on the petition filed on the 23rd day of March 2005 by Plaintiff for a Rehearing and En Banc by the Full Supreme Court Justices:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of June 2005."
